titleStmt.title: Pietas Parisiensis, or, A short description of the pietie and charitie comonly [sic] exercised in Paris which represents in short, the pious practises of the whole Catholike Church / by Thomas Carre ...
titleStmt.author: Carre, Thomas, 1599-1674.
